definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.chinese: 深浓美艳如红宝石的颜色。

sentences.english: Monseigneur was out at a little supper most nights, with fascinating company.
sentences.chinese: 大人大多数晚上都要跟美艳的友伴们外出使餐。

sentences.english: Sweet Helen, made me immortal with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 美艳绝伦的海伦啊，请给我一个吻，使我永恒不朽。

sentences.english: The spies listed here are the top 10 beautiful lady spies from the history.
sentences.chinese: 以下所列是历史上10位最美艳的女间谍。

sentences.english: Young beauties with gorgeous dresses are all sharp swords.
sentences.chinese: 美艳红装，尽是杀人利刃。

sentences.english: A fairly deep salmon-pink color enhanced by a long stream of fine bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 深肉粉色泽，在一串串精致汽泡衬托下更加深沉美艳。

sentences.english: Chuchudongren you look today, absolutely beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 你今日看起来楚楚感人，美艳绝伦。

sentences.english: Medea, the sensual and ravishing sorceress of Greek mythology, enters the royal chambers.
sentences.chinese: 美狄亚，希腊神话中性感美艳的女巫，走进皇庭。

definition: lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
